title: One year of Covid & the special election in Texas
description: Chuck talks about the top news from his interviews with Jeffrey Zients, Michael Osterholm, Sen. Manchin & Sen. Barrasso. Carrie Dann looks at the many candidates running in a Texas special election.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
